value:
$WmMPID_チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah! Are you the bad people that
Veronica warned us about?$k$pWhy can't you just go away?
Besides, if you get any
closer...$k$pI won't be able to hold back, and
then...I can't help it if I do awful
things to all of you!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You beat me? Thanks to you,
I'm back to my normal self!$k$pEven better—now I don't need
to fight anymore!$k

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Well done, everyone. That's one
more successful mission!$k$pSeems like the Emblian Empire
wasn't after Marth at all this time.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|If only we could close the gateway to
the World of Mystery, then the
Emblians couldn't keep going in.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|You're probably asking yourself why
we don't just guard the gateways,
$Nu.$k$p$EFace_Anger|The thing is, we do.$k$pOr at least we try—but there are
just too many gateways and
too many Emblian soldiers.$k$pI wish that we royals of Askr had
the ability to close the way to
those worlds.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|The royal powers to open and close
the gateways are meant to work
in tandem.$k$pI wonder, if Askr could close gates,
would the power to open them
simply shift to Embla?$k$p$EFace_Cool|Legends suggest that might be so.
And if it is, then we'd be just as
stuck in this predicament!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|That'd be even worse. Then we'd
have to check ALL the gates, not
just the ones we once opened!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Veronica's war will continue until
one realm has both powers or
we learn to cooperate again.$k$pBut for now, we are stuck, and
chances are that all this was
just another distraction.$k$pWho knows what gateway Embla
has gone through while we've
been here? We need to find out.$k$Sbs150|
